name: Birthday Page
description: An online birthday page that resembles an ordinary birthday card. But this one allows you to put 6 beautiful and memorable pictures together, this feature could help you and your birthday friends build deeper connections.

name: Album of High School Memories
description: This is my high school class memorial album, all our memories are immortalized here! You can get acquainted with all the members of my class here, besides that there are also our photos and videos.

name: Personal Data Science Projects
description: This is a collection of my data science projects that I create for fun and learning purposes. I perform exploratory data analysis, model selection, and hyperparameter tuning here!

name: Current Weather
description: If you want to know how the weather is like today, this is the place for you! This page will tell you today's weather prediction. Apart from that, it will inform you about the weather, city coordinates, and wind conditions.

name: Movies Search
description: If you love movie, this is the right place for you! This page will pull out 10 movies on every search, you can also check the details of every movie there. The details cover the plot, actors, director, and many others.

name: Company Profile
description: Simple design and lightweight web page for company profiles. This page helps readers to understand how your business works. It also can give you the opportunity to inform the market about your business and what you have to offer to help them. This page has description of the business. service description, client, client portfolio, and contact form. You can include more items if needed.

name: Online Shop
description: This web application will make it easier for you to manage your online store. The main page will show all your products with a short description, customers can also sort the products by recent posts or likes. In the admin page, you can manage, add, update or delete. Additionally, customers don't need to create any account to give a like your product. To make things easier, this app also supports multiple admins!

name: Horoscope
description: Read today's daily horoscope for all the zodiac signs on this page. There are additional horoscopes for this week, month and year!
